description: Search work-around implemented. Reset now functions since removing data from search does not revert data but real-time search is functioning. SearchBar.js now has a full rewrite for function.

Real-time search reinstated. Rewrite of SearchBar.js and adding of <SearchBar data={filteredProducts} onDataSearch={handleProductSearch} /> and  <SearchBar data={filteredAddons} onDataSearch={handleAddonSearch} />
Shut down real-time search due to bug with transition. Will return once new UI animations are in effect.
Beginning stages of a transition effect for the UI. Work in progress, stage 1 complete
Fixed duplication errors in the new search functions
Added real-time search to the search function
